> <OLD - Nightlight>
>
>
> Nightlightshook with fear, and waited for the final desition.

<NEW>

The trip to the other portal was relatively quick. At a few spots they
ran into SHARKTICON guards, but rather than confront them they let
them pass, pressing themselves against the wall or into a convinient
room.

"This way!" SHARPEDGE, obvious the more courageous of the two MAXIMAL
soldiers with NIGHTLIGHT. "It's here." They had arrived at a door. One
that was thick and looked to be built to with stand a small siege.

"Gimmie a moment." STAMPY said as he slid up to the lock and pulled
out a small bit of tools - lock picks!

SHARPEDGE nodded as he pulled NIGHTLIGHT next to him to keep her out
of sight should gaurds come.

"Almost got it, almost got it." STAMPY said as he worked feverishly.

"You'd better hurry." SHARPEDGE said as he looked around nervously.

There was a small chuckle of victory. "Got it!" STAMPY said.

The door slid open, and there, facing SHARPEDGE, STAMPY and NIGHTLIGHT
was perhaps one of the more powerful of the PREDACONS save for
MAGMATRON himself.

GUILEDART. (http://tfwiki.net/wiki/Guiledart)

"Frag!" STAMPY said as his jaw dropped.

(TAG)

- Preston
